title: Vel'Koz disabled?
body:
I just bought Vel'Koz and when I select him in draft pick I am unable to Join a game.
The error that appears says: Invalid Champ Selection or something along those lines.
Any ideas on what might be going wrong ?

replies.body: He isn't disabled, as Laughing Fish mentioned, it may be an issue with the client.
He doesn't appear to be disabled. Trying closing and relaunching the client, and see if that fixes it.
